stone.modules.songData

Class Deserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • stone.modules.songData.Deserializer

  • public abstract class Deserializer
extends java.lang.Object
    The data read from previous runs is stored in an archice. This class helps to retrieve the stored information
    Author:
    Nelphindal

      • abort

        public final void abort()
        Terminates all processes invoked by deserialize()

      • addToQueue

        public final void addToQueue(ModEntry song)
        Informs that a song with given properties have been found and the related data of the deserialization process may be kept
        Parameters:
        song - a found song

      • crawlDone

        public final void crawlDone()
        Informs that no more calls of addToQueue(ModEntry) will happen

      • deserialize

        public final void deserialize()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Reads completely compressed files to retrieve saved data from previous run
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O-Error occurs

      • finish

        public final void finish()
        Informs that reading part of deserialize() is done

      • getDeserialTask

        public abstract java.lang.Runnable getDeserialTask()
        Implementing classes have to implement this method. A task shall be returned which can implement DeserializeContainer
        Returns:
        a task which Runnable.run() will deserialize on part of outstanding work

      • getIO

        public final IOHandler getIO()
        This method is identical to calling SongData.getIOHandler() upon sdc
        Returns:
        IOHandler to use

      • getRoot

        public final Path getRoot()
        This method is identical to calling SongData.getRoot() upon sdc
        Returns:
        the base of relative paths of used SongData

      • pollFromQueue

        public final ModEntry pollFromQueue()
        Gets next element to work on
        Returns:
        element to work on

      • queueIsEmpty

        public final boolean queueIsEmpty()
        Checks if queue filled by addToQueue(ModEntry) and depleted by pollFromQueue() is empty. It will stay empty if crawlDone() has been invoked
        Returns:
        true if underlying queue is empty

      • serialize

        public final void serialize(SongDataEntry data)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Converts given data to a stream of bytes to retrieve same information on next run
        Parameters:
        data - informatin to save
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O-Error occurs
